Aujourd’hui la groupe est un trio de tête : deux musiciens perchés sur des câbles et des machines home made accompagnant une chanteuse sans limite. Le tout enveloppé dans la musique de vos rêves d’après-midi. Un son. Une caresse. Une secousse. C’est Mab !"

Trompettiste et multi-instrumentiste, Cyril aka Lakay nous invite depuis 2008 à découvrir ses univers riches et vivants. Issu d'influences à la fois traditionnelles et undergrounds, ce musicien mélange habilement les instruments traditionnels comme la trompette, le saxophone, la guitare, le seung Thaïlandais et les percussions réunionnaises aux synthés et boucles électroniques. Ce mélange coloré nous offre une musique à la fois énergique et méditative propice à l'éveil des sens et des émotions.

Trompettiste et multi-instrumentiste, Cyril nous invite depuis 2008 à découvrir ses différents univers. Toujours attiré par les musiques électroniques et sa rencontre avec les instruments traditionnels, à la recherche de nouvelles sonorités, de nouveaux rythmes, il revient aujourd'hui avec un nouveau projet : "Lapsykay". Un mélange aux couleurs PsyTrance - PsyDub - Jazzy sur des beats énergiques, colorés et groovyadelik !
Album "Shamanik Therapy" en préparation, comming soon on Hadra Records

bio.en:
DJ Las’hark
(Electrik Dream / Magnetika Agency)

DJ Las’hark aka Isabel Neves first started in the Chill Out scene in the late 90’s as event producer but soon debuted as deejay in 2000. She was co-founder of the mythical Dreamlab – chill out or die! and co-produced the Chill Out areas for Goodmood all around Portugal. She was part of Boom Festival's production team from 2000 to 2009 and co-headed the Chill Out area until 2002.
She was one of the first female dj’s of the psychedelic movement in Portugal and introduced her eclectic taste and multicultural influences in the chill out concept by mixing electronic with world music, fusing organic and ethnical moods to create a joyful sound journey.

bio.fr: Chercheurs de pépites sonores africaines, sud américaine et caribéennes, les Frères Jackfruit vous embarquent pour un voyage sous le soleil des tropiques. Cumbia, compas, en passant par l’afro-beat, le baile funk et la samba, leurs Dj Sets, dansants et éclectiques, sont une véritable fusion entre les musiques traditionnelles et modernes.

bio.en: For over nearly two decades Liquid Ross has been shaping the new sounds of trance on the dancefloors of the UK and acroos the world

bio.fr:
Née dans un pot de Rillettes, élevée dans une charcuterie, nourrie au Génépi, Mariée avec ses casseroles !

Voilà qui est La Mère à Xavier, une rombière bien en chair, qui du fond de sa cuisine où la graisse collée au mur a stoppé le temps et tout figé, même les mouches.
Deux aficionados de la fiesta, du kick bass et de la musique qui fout le bronx...
Après avoir écumé un petit paquet de scènes et de dancefloor en laissant sortir a flots le gras de leur progressive trance rissolée, ils ont décidé de revenir un temps aux fondamentaux, et a leur premier amour : la techno.

Largement influencés par les tontons de l'ancien temps, autant que par la scène actuelle, ils se cherchent dans se nouveau et vaste monde musical. Leurs influences psy / prog traînent toujours au fond de la marmite, pour des lives cadencés et bien mentaux !

Et on ne sait jamais, on a si vite dérapé sur le bouton des BPM.....

bio.en: Logic Bomb was formed in in 1998 by two freshly graduated computer engineers Jonas Pettersson and Johan Kraft who were struck with a profound fascination for psychedelic music. In next few years then happened to become one of the most recognized and original psychedelic trance acts and blow the scene with their unique sound. After more than 15 years of music making, intensive touring major psychedelic events around the world, albums and hundred of other releases on most respected labels things are stirring again in the Logic Bomb studio. The new album is now being mastered and will be released shortly on Z-Plane.

Logic Flux is a new project by legendary artists Dennis Tapper aka Hux Flux and Jonas Pettersson aka Logic Bomb that was founded right in the heart of Z-Plane records. It’s a historical reunion of two creative minds who once started their musical journey together but gained worldwide success as different projects.  A lot of new cutting age hi-end music is coming very soon from their studio located in a picturesque Swedish countryside. It can’t be nothing else but top quality psychedelic trance when these two brainiacs are in the studio together. Check for upcoming releases on Z-Plane Records and catch them live around the globe.

Loose connection is a high energy based high-tech live act from the uk and have been smashing dance floors for nearly a decade.They have covered the majority of the psychedelic festivals around Europe and have played all over Australia and in the states. With there unique blend of night time psy they continue to push there boundaries into sonic wizardry and for the listeners pleasure!

bio.fr:
Dj Lucky Cat alias Greg est devenu artiste en 1993, organisateur de soirées et d'évènements
dès 1999 dont les fameuses soirées Solaris depuis 10 ans au Bt59 sur Bordeaux, label manager
du label international Mandala records depuis 2004. Greg est un grand passionné et fervent activiste pour la reconnaissance de la culture Rave, des musiques électroniques & de la culture
Trance Psychedelique en France depuis le début de sa carrière autodidacte.

Porté par des influences musicales variées, Greg témoigne de sa passion sur les dancefloors et
à travers Mandala records, il a déjà produit quatres compilations dont différents artistes tels que
Total Eclipse, Plasmotek, Hyper Frequencies ... Il voyage avec aisance entre la Trance Progressive, Tribal et Psychedelique, mixant ses influences musicales avec des artistes tels que :: Hallucilogen// Sphongle// Raja Ram// Infected Mushroom// Juno Reactor// Astral Projection// Hilight Tribe//
X-Dream// Ace Ventura// Astrix// G.m.s// Zen Mechanics// Ticon// Kokbox// Earthling// Sub6//
Liquid Soul// Major7// Neelix// Domestic// Freedom Fighters// Sonic Species// Vini Vici// E-Clip// Protonica// Egorythmia// Capital Monkey// Morten Granan// Phaxe// The Antidote// Voyager ...

Sa musique est en symbiose parfaite avec l’énergie qu’il dégage à la fois mélodieuse et entraînante, groovy et harmonieuse. Il enchaîne les dates aux quatre coins de l’hexagone, animateur sur Fg98.2 dans les années 2000, grande radio française de musiques electroniques, des premières free-party
aux évènements plus réputés tels que la Techno Parade, l’Hadra Trance Festival,
l’Electrobotik Invasion, Namasté, Transubtil, Gaïa Concept, Stereorganic, Electrohm … Rapidement,
GREG se fait une place dans ce milieu en effervescence et son univers transcendera les frontières
pour raisonner dans des évènements et des festivals internationaux phares tels que
Sonica (Montenegro), Soulclipse (Turquie), Freedom (Portugal), Never Summer Ends (Suisse),
Royaume-Uni, Ibiza, Espagne, Grèce, Brésil, Mexique ...

En véritable passionné effréné, il endosse le rôle d’organisateur dès 1999, au total ce ne sont pas
moins de 300 parties qui ont pu voir le jour grâce à son activisme avec Mandala records,
Dragon Tribe, Maya Vibes Experience sur Paris, Nantes, Bordeaux, Toulouse, La Rochelle ...
GREG aime partager sa passion & faire vibrer les foules depuis presque 20 ans en organisant de beaux évènements réunissant divers artistes internationaux & français talentueux de tous horizons artistiques.

Aujourd’hui, Greg revient avec son nouveau projet Lucky Cat, enrichi de son expérience
et de la richesse de ses rencontres, il franchit une nouvelle étape dans sa carrière.
De nouvelles promesses sonores à découvrir bientôt sur les dancefloors, Stay Tuned !!

bio.en:
Luís Moreira is a young artist from Almada, Portugal.

He stepped in the local and international scene with a blast, instantly acquiring fans from around the globe showcasing his distinct mix of progressive and melodic techno with a hint of psychedelic music.

He is known for having some of most memorable basslines around the scene, which deliver dancefloors at clubs and music festivals an expertly crafted sonic experience from start to end.

He currently releases music under Qilla Records, ODN Records, Techgnosis Records and Digital Structures.

Fast gaining popularity in the french psychedelic scene is Maïtika, a Psytrance Progressive Project Created by two young producers Jocelin Varlet & Nicolas Lavenue, old friends sharing the same passion for music since their childhood.

In 2013 they decided to create the Maïtika project to mix their desires, enrich their knowledge and share their vision of music with the world. Their productions have since then been turning heads around the world and took to the notice of renowned label from India, Digital Om Productions who they joined ranks with as label live act. Now with a few massive releases and collaborations they are ready to present their live and original set to the world.

Romanian DJ producer music visionary Mara LeFay embraced electronic music at the club warehouse scene in Berlin and Paris and eventually settled into London. This passion opened a new journey into her life. Now based in London, she played in venues like Troxy London, Ministry of Sound, Lakota Bristol to name a few. Keeping an eclectic vibe while not belonging to any musical style, but using music as a form of expression and always looking for fresh sounds that represent the current state of the scene.

Home is the world of creating, performing and experimenting with sounds.
Always influenced by his environment, musicians and friends, and a great sense of curiosity his tastes naturally spiralled in on the limitless space of ambient, electronica and different styles of techno music.
He focused his work on live performances for quite a long time and In 2009, he decided to dedicate himself more to studio work after years of performing and producing. His music has since received international support form different imprints such as Bine Music ( kompact ), Silent Season, Dewtone, Ultimae and Sub.spiele.
He moved to Austria end of 2014. Surrounded by beautiful and peaceful Landscapes Martin found deepness in new inspirations for upcoming projects.

Eyal ytshari is a visionary music producer based in Israel, who puts his main intention in opening people's hearts and souls through the vibration of musical journeys. Bouncing between ancient beats and magical melodies, The Master Minded brings back the lost connection to planet earth and to the cosmic link that opens up deeper and hidden portals of AWARENESS

Melting Point are Ralph K. Freund aka Braincell and Matheus Nogueira aka Earthspace, which started this collab in 2016. The result of those two artists ends up in a fluid music experience, full of funkyness and psychedelia.

Mike Neuschler aka Microdot, has been blasting DJ sets of full-on and night psychedelic music across Europe and beyond for many seasons now.

A native to Austria, his first taste for electronic music came from the techno scene in 2002 where he played his first sets and honed his skills. He moved into full-on psytrance a couple years later, which saw him welcomed into 24/7 Records as a label DJ.

As years passed he became curious to dabble in his own productions. And with an appetite for night psychedelia growing, launched the live project 'Filterheads' with long term friend and mentor K.i.M.

While Filterheads has been a great success, Mike's passion for DJ'ing remains just as strong today. He can be seen as a regular on the European festival circuit, dishing out sledging night psy and banging full on sets.

bio.fr: Watch press kit

bio.en:
Presskit: http://bit.ly/IBPresskits
Select the folder MUSATTI and there it go.

Dj Natron aka Laugi hails from the Northeast of Germany, has been born in November of 1983, and has been living in Hamburg since 2001. Pystrance began enticing him in 1999. Loving the laughing people on the floor and the music which put them into meditation he also started to dj in 2002 and went from organising his first small open air in 2004 to organising the IntactXpanda in Hamburg every Winter and the Psychedelic Experience Open Air every May as well. His contribution to the quest for the original Psytrance sound was founding his own label Solar Tech Records in March of 2009. Its motto already says it all: Serious Psytrance. Thru many ups and downs, thankful for the support of his family and friends Dj Natron keeps playing music in between Progressive and FullOn, at 140-145 bpm – deep high quality on the dot with a progressive touch, pumping baselines intended to let people fly. Preferably at sunset or dawn he has had sets at all larger European festivals. The first compilations of Solar Tech were teeming with rolling, deep basses, mind-bending sound figures and hypnotic melodies. Pushing but still relaxed this music is definitely aiming at the mind! In the future international djs from all continents will present their visions of original Psytrance music here.

DJ Nazca music can be describe as a surreal journey into the sound. An alien frequency that ressonates psychedelic waves through the air, with goa elements along some techno & ethnical influences, A strong, original, hypnotic, liquid & organic sound. Better appreciated under a sky full of stars.

bio.fr:
Nëru est un projet live Downtempo.

Inspiré par les productions des labels Shanti Planti, Gravitas et par des artistes comme Ott, Ecometric, Light Child Project. Nëru tente de proposer une musique inspirante pour le corps et l'esprit. Grâce au mélange de synthétiseurs analogiques, de voix et d'instruments à corde et à vent, il propose de vous raconter une histoire sur le voyage de l'âme.

Le choix du nom Nëru vient de Jawaharlal Nehru (जवाहरलाल नेहरू en hindi), il fut l’une des figures de proue de la lutte pour l’indépendance de l’Inde avant de devenir le 1er Premier ministre de l’Inde le 15 août 1947. Il est le père d’Indira Gandhi, première femme à occuper le poste de Premier ministre en Inde, sans le moindre lien de famille avec Mohandas Gandhi.

bio.en:
In the 90’s, Opale discovers ethnik psybient downtempo and embraces the psychedelic culture, a revelation that changed both her life and its perception.
Invited around the globe to perform at a wide variety of events such as Burning Man in Nevada, surfing from the Trance to the Contempory Arts scene.
For a few years she has been building up the tempo, collaborating live with various artists such as Adn at the Ozora Festival, the epic World People pirates, the Eclipse and Open Mind in Canada ; with Don Pedro Askata on electronic drums at the Boom, the Karma Kusala and Aya Atma, Lakay with his trumpet at the Hadra Festival or with Tasha at the famous Chrysalid & Wildthings in the UK.
Opale weaves electro-world grooves with waves of beyond the border emotions delightfully, inviting us on a journey through the most celestial and tribal depths, arousing the intellect and the senses.
Her passion led her to become responsible for the music programmation of the Harmonic Festival which takes place every summer in the south of France. Launched in 2015, Harmonic is an alternative culture gathering open towards music, environment, spirituality and well-being.
Opale currently works on a compilation to be released on Ultimae featuring works by young artists she met on the road as well seasoned composers of the downtempo scene.


Dans les années 90 Opale découvre les sons psybient ethnik downtempo et embrasse la culture psychedelique, révélation qui a changé sa vie et la perception qu’elle en a.
Invitée aux quatre coins du monde à jouer pour des évènements aussi variés qu’hétéroclites tel que le Burning Man dans le Névada,  dans de nombreux festivals trance ou encore dans le monde de l’Art contemporain.
Depuis quelques années elle accélère le tempo en collaborant avec différents artistes en live, tel que Adn pour le festival Ozora, chez les épiques pirates des World People, ou pour l’Eclipse festival ou l’Open Mind au Canada. Avec Don Pedro Askata aux percus électroniques au Boom, Karma Kusala, & Aya Atma, Lakay à la trompette à l’Hadra, ou encore avec Tasha, aux fameux rendez-vous des Chrysalid & Wildthings en Angleterre.
Elle nous régale sur des ambiances electro-world, tissées de samples d’ailleurs, mariés à des nappes d’émotions et vous invite à la rejoindre dans l’ivresse des profondeurs… Des plus célestes aux plus tribales... Des plus sensibles aux plus mentales.
Cette passion l’amène à devenir responsable de la programmation musicale du Festival Harmonic qui a lieu en été dans le sud de la France. Lancé en 2015, Harmonic est un évènement prometteur, orienté sur la culture alternative, que ce soit dans le domaine musical, environnemental, spirituel ou du bien-être.
Opale travaille sur une compilation à sortir sur le label Ultimae courant 2017 qui présentera le travail de jeunes artistes découverts sur la route et de grands noms du milieu downtempo.

Orestis was born in Athens, Greece (1980).
His first musical experiences were with metal / gothic / dark wave and hardcore sounds.
His own music style, trademarked by deep atmospheric influences,
strong percussive elements and an attention to the progression of the sonic story.
Orestis compositions are inspired by the universal flow of our daily feelings and experiences...

Radikal Moodz is a Psytrance project created by two French producers (Maxime and Dominique).
It is by creating a groovy and psychedelic universe that they stand out and enter the SHROOM PROD family in 2016.
In 2017, he met and collaborated with the Spanish Label MAHARETTA RECORDS.

Radioactive.Cake, Zeitgeist, Munstrous, Dark Passenger…that’s all Robert H. from Berlin Germany. Not only producer and performer for many years, he also established the music label Glitchy.Tonic.Records in 2009, which is now one of the leading forces in the subgenre "Psygressive Trance". Taking the first musical steps around the time of the millennium, his skills and technique and productions were constantly evolving and advancing over the years. In late 2008 he felt he finally reached the quality to go way more professional. He brought Radioactive.Cake and Zeitgeist to life, aiming for releases and gigs and of course for good feedback. Getting all three, he soon wanted another challenge or rather more ways of expressing his musical creativity and he started Munstrous and Dark Passenger. The total music range of all four projects put together goes from night time 'Psygressive' or 'Dark Progressive' to a bit more funky and jazzy and sometimes „swampy“ trance to some more techno stuff and downbeat. Today, Robert can look back to a long list of releases and has quite some experience performing his stuff live. He played his projects at Festivals like Freqs Of Nature, Boom Festival, Solaris Festival, Cosmo Festival, Transylvania Calling, Pandemonium Festival, SpaceCamp Psyfari Festival and others.

bio.fr: Le Rakoon est un animal pas comme les autres... Son régime alimentaire est des plus variés: il se nourrit de rythmes trance, de guitare rock, d'accents psychédéliques et de structures pop. Ces mets puisés aux quatre coins du monde, s'alient alors avec son gout intarissable pour les skanks et les basslines electroniques pour faire briller au plus fort son pelage Electro Dub. C'est au studio, dans son habitat naturel qu'il façonne son caractère musical espiègle, joyeux et rebondissant, tout en restant profondément ancré dans la terre. Mais son hibernation ne dure qu'un temps: très vite il lui faut voyager et partager d'innombrables moment de bonheur dans ces réunions cocasses où les animaux les plus curieux se retrouvent pour sourire et danser tous ensemble.

bio.en:
It all started at an early age - recording mix tapes for his friends to share his taste and vision of music. As a logical result of his deep passion for electronic music, he learned all about the mysteries of Djing and even ran a record Store called ‘Sonic Implant’ for some years.

Through time, he became a solid point of reference around Germany, and was booked to play his Sets at Fusion Festival, Antaris, Vuuv, Freqs of Nature - including important resident spots at Hai in den Mai and Wonderland Festival (Waldfrieden) from 2007 to present.

But he didn’t stop there! His reputation brought him requests from all around the globe, so he got to play at festivals like Universo Parallelo (Brasil), Experience Festival / Moon Mountain (Thailand), Grasshopper / Overdrive / Wingmakers Parties (Japan), and Parties in Mexico, Spain, Netherlands, Italy, UK, Sweden, Denmark, Czech Republic…

For sure, a peak in his DJ-career, was the release of his highly acclaimed compilation ’13’ on Blue Hour Sounds in 2013, where he had the possibility to express his vision of Psychedelic Trance and to promote the music he loves to play in his DJ-sets.
Watch out for his 2nd and soon upcoming Compilation for Maharetta Records.

Talking of style - Raoul’s is definitely best describable as ‘straight forward and friendly - with a hint of long forgotten elements of Goatrance’.
Apart from his pure psytrance Sets he now also rocks dancefloors with some deeper and darker progressive sounds.

Right now, he is kicking it off with a successful series of parties named ‘Synæsthesia’ happening in Germany - where he is responsible for the lineup and booking. He is part of the Maharetta Records and Blue Hour Sounds family.

Since about 20 years we are involved into the Psytrance Scence. After 3 years with dj-ing, we realised, that the records from other people were not enough for us. And look at this, since about 9 years we are producing our own psychedelic trance. We started in a small cellar with a little soundsystem. At the beginning we just used simple software-synthies and a small sequenzer-programm. Because of our limited possiblities, it was not easy for us to produce a good quality of sound...Hard work and a lot of enthusiasm caused a booking from some friends in Switzerland. They wanted us for a live-act. Jehaa, our first set, which we played with some quite old synthies, as like Roland 101 and Korg Trident. As you can understand, we were more than nervous. But we were more than happy, that the feedback of our first act was really great and amazing.. So, we decided to go ahead with our crazy music. The time and the more bookings opened us the chance to buy some new sound-machines.
On a special day, we decided to send our first songs to some differnt labels around the world. Wepacked this CD´s together with all our positive vibrations ;) and what happend: Yaniv, from Hadshot Haheizar released our first two songs. "FREAK BOOSTER" and "UNIDENTIFIED SPECIES". A big thank you to you, Yaniv! We guess, we do not have to explain you our feeling, as we hold our first vinyl in our hands. Unbelievable.....
After playing on many parties around the globe, like Portugal, Netherland, Mexico, Greece, USA, UK, Brazil, South Africa etc. there was time for an album which was released also on Hadshot and more to ome on Boom! Rec., Digital Psionics, Ketuh, Glowing Flame, Phar Psyde Records and so on......

bio.fr: Passionné de musique depuis toujours, j'ai commencé par les percussions traditionnelles africaines mandingues, j'ai ensuite découvert la musique traditionnelle indienne et ses raggas, autoditacte et multi-instrumentiste je me suis naturellement orienté vers la musique électronique qui me permet d'exprimer toutes mes influences aussi variées que mes origines......RELOAD est l'aboutissement d'une longue recherche sur la manière d'aborder la musique électronique, une volonté de travailler le son comme une matière, un tout, et donc produit par une seule machine, d'où le synthétiseur modulaire qui permet de créer son propre instrument suivant ses propres sensibilités....et qui permet aussi de jouer le tout en live, chaque prestation étant unique, la profondeur du son analogique crée et modulé en temps réel

bio.en:
Sérgio Walgood is a Portuguese music producer involved in several projects with tracks edited for multiple record labels around the world. He has been participating actively in events around Europe, to name a few, among others are all editions of the ZNA Gathering, Boom Festival 2006/2008/2010/2014, Hadra festival, Freedom festival, etc.
More about this artist in his website: http://www.sergiowalgood.com
Shotu & Manu will perform a psychedelic powerfull set like the are using to to at Hadra Festival !

bio.fr:
Sleeping Forest, est une artiste ambient du label Altervision Hadra. Son style allie des influences tournées vers le rock psychédélique et la world music à une minutie propre aux musiques électroniques. Son premier album « Rise of Nature » est sorti en février 2013 sur Hadra Records auquel s'ajoute de nombreuses sorties sur des compilations de différents labels.
Sleeping Forest a pu jouer ses morceaux dans de nombreux festivals en Europe et plus loin encore comme l'Inde, le Japon et le Pérou. En plus de ses autres projets menés avec Lunarave tels que Lovpact (Hadra records) et Backsliderz (OVNI records), elle compose aujourd'hui sont second album. Elle a à cœur de développer dans sa musique des atmosphères à la fois lancinante, mélancolique et épique. Ses compositions regorgent de mélodies chargées en émotions et de nappes en constante évolution. On y retrouve des rythmiques entêtantes dans lesquelles les instruments percussifs traditionnels sont mis à l'honneur et de savants agencements mélodiques qui rappellent de nombreux courants musicaux tels que le classique, le rock progressif, le trip-hop ou encore les musiques de film.

Smooth Criminal is the  side techno project of Theo GROZDANIC, better known as OddWave (Psytrance), a project that no longer appears on the French and European scene after having scoured most of the festivals with its multiple releases and albums on the label Hadra Records. He present now his new project to explore the many facets of the universe of techno. In a very short time, the project interests many promoters and organizers by its varied and punchy progressive sets. It already happens on major events and festivals and comes out of numerous releases on the compilation TECH TALES, the labels Electric power pole, Limonade records and many others to come. [Fr]   Smooth Criminal est le side project techno de Theo GROZDANIC plus connu sous le nom de OddWave (Psytrance),projet qu'on ne présente plus sur la scène française et européenne après avoir écumer la plupart des festivals avec ses multiples release et albums sur le label Hadra Records. Il nous présente maintenant son nouveau projet visant à explorer les multiples facettes de l'univers de la techno. En très peu de temps, le projet intéresse beaucoup de promoteurs et d'organisateurs par ses sets progressifs variés et punchy. Il se produits déjà sur de gros événements et festivals et sors de multiples sorties sur les compilation TECH TALES, les labels Electric power pole, Limonade records et bien d'autres à venir

bio.en:
Having started in 1994 as a producer and DJ, Ralph founded the project Rastaliens together with his friend Jay. In 2003 they released the album «Xplore The Wild Side» on BooM! Records. At the same time he moved to Switzerland with his wife and decided to start his own project called ‚Braincell‘. His first album «Universal Language» was released in 2005, which was followed by an impressive string of releases on various compilations and major labels. Two years after his debut, his second album «Transformation of Reality» came out. The last Rastaliens album «Back on Earth» was released in 2007. One year after, Braincell's third album «Frequency Evolution» was released on Glowing Flame Records and in 2010 his fourth album «Intelligent Being» came out on Free Spirit Records. These CD's were followed by several releases on various compilations. The «5th» album was released back on ‚BooM! Records‘ and the 6th album «Connecting Multiverses» was released on ‚Blue Hour Sounds‘ in 17. February 2017.

Since 2007 Ralph has also been producing tracks by the project name ‚Solar Spectrum‘, which represents the more progressive side of his creativity. Solar Spectrum's debut album «Planes of Existence» was released on Free Freak Records in 2009 and his second album «(R)Evolution of Consciousness» was released two years after on Free Spirit Records. «The Reunion» EP was released on BooM! Records in 2013 together with his 3rd album «Source Energy Creations» (re-released on Ovnimoon Rec.) and 4th album «Droplets from the matrix» (Ovnimoon Rec.) followed by several releases on various VAs and Labels. The 5th album «Divine Energy» was released on Furthur Progressions Rec. in December 2016.

In 2013 it was time for an Ambient/Chill/Downbeat project which was realized under the name ‚Unknown Reality‘. Releases are available on unknownreality.bandcamp.com and the 2nd full length album is on its way.

Last but not least there are several collaborations coming up with other artists from the international Psytrance & Ambient scene like ‚Melting Point‘ (together with Earthspace) and ‚Driftsetters‘ (with Maluns).

To date Ralph have been playing on every major continent; in countries like: USA, Brazil, Mexico, Australia, South Africa, India, Thailand, UK, Switzerland and all over Europe etc. and received much praise for his energetic and emotional live shows, DJ sets and production skills.

Since 2002 and his first contact with french techno and electro cultures, Alexandre became one with this underground part of culture and took part to these movement. Member of Grenoble’s underground culture, he began to arrange in 2003, under the name Kalifer. In 2012, he integrated the collective “Les Rythmes Actuels” with this uptempo project with psyprog, psytrance or progressive techno.

In 2016, Alexandre, aka Soleye, integrate the chill area in Hadra Records. Deeply inspire by nature, love, sharing and well-being, he evolves inside rythms and atmospheres of Chill-Out and Downtempo culture.

His integration on Hadra Records allow to confirm the musical diversity of our alternative area and we enjoy it greatly !

The concept of Sonic Elysium was established by Alexey ‘LSB’ Mamzelev in 2008. Having a serious musical background of the Moscow Music School #1 graduate and the education of telecom engineer, Alexey skillfully masters spine-shivering harmonies as well as the sound perfection. Never to be described as just ‘psy’, ‘goa’ or ‘fullon’ music, Sonic Elysium renders the finest parts of all the subgenres into a nice blend of driving bass lines, precisely tuned sound effects and analogue leads rich in melodies, along with mantras and ancient chantings to deliver the  ultimate experience of pure joy, driving the dance floors into ritual ecstasy. Advancing in his musical career, Alexey has recently become a promoter himself. Series of indoor events along with the annual Skazka Festival, meaning “The Fairytale”, and gathering so far 1500 happy freaks in the sacred Russian woods for 3 years already since 2014, spotlight the talent and contribution into the world trance culture.

Jay Southwild is a electronic music producer from the south(wild) Black-Forrest in Germany. Together with his friend Ralph he foundet the psychedelic trance project Rastaliens about more then 10 years ago... over the years of playing in clubs and festivals worldwide.
Southwild is Jays solo project and 2010 he joined the UK based label Wildthings records wich is a solid established label for twisted positive psychedelic trance.
After he released his debut album on Wildthings records and serveral tracks on compilations from major undergroud labels worldwide such as Wildthings,Sangoma,looney moon rec.,Hadra just to name a few...

StereOMantra (from Budapest) became known a few years ago for his progressive rhythms and melodic, unique sounding chillout music. He performed at numerous Hungarian and international festivals and events throughout Europe.

He released 4 albums, 1 EP and 2 chillout compilations ("Fairy Tales" series) featuring acclaimed artists, and beside these he provided many tracks for other international compilations too.
The chillout albums he produced in the last 2 years were published by OM Mantra Records he had founded, and for the festival he will bring the best out from these albums for us, together with some never ever heard, unreleased newest tunes.

Symbolico music is all about sending us to zero state of being. That state in which we take a step back from our personal life situation and beliefs Into a place when we become aware of our self as the script writers of our own life. From that point of view, life seems to appear very much symbolic to you as if it is part of a mysterious book written by a cosmic being called you. The wisdom behind the project is based on a musical expression of the work of some of the most respected spiritual teachers, philosophers and open minded meta physicians such as: Alan Watts, Eckhart Tolle, Deepak Chopra, Dr. Bruce Lipton, Dr. Hew Len, Nassim Haramein and many more.

bio.fr:
Tête pensante de la branche « Chill » du label Hadra Records et programmateur du Hadra Trance Festival, Sysyphe est un artiste complet en recherche constante de nouvelles perles musicales.
Après deux compilations Hadravision et un premier album Running Up That Hill produits par Hadra, Sysyphe poursuit son chemin avec un très attendu deuxième album The Cities of Silver Trees, récit d'une quête intérieure dans les méandres d'une forêt nourricière, havre de paix et source de toute vie. Les arbres de sève, de pierre et de lumière sont le décor de cet univers aussi réel qu'imaginaire auquel Sysyphe nous invite à prendre part, le temps d'une simple balade ou d'un cheminement plus lointain et intime. Résolument downtempo, cet album marque le pas d'une incursion sensible et déterminée au coeur de notre nature profonde.

bio.en:
Tajmahal is Electrik Dream’s label manager, but he is also part in a number of different projects around the world.
Currently, he is Working on a healing chill out project « UASCA » in collaboration with Dj Fluxo (Portugal).
Taj was Invited by Jean Luc Briancon aka « Kurtz Mindfiled » to participate in the finalization of the composition and mastering of the final cd of a trilogy albums.
This project is an homage to the Berlin School Ambient period, for the analogue sound lovers.

When Dj-ing, he combines his spotless technical skills with creativity, expressed via his broad and eclectic musical knowledge: he is famous for telling a story and leading the
crowd step by step on the path to dance floor enlightenment.
This path can encompass different music styles: Ambient, Downtempo, Progressiv, Techno, Full on, Psy Trance - all within the same DJ set: Taj knowns no stylistic boundaries or
tempos restrictions.
This Year Hadra offer him the chance to play twice as Dj, one set will be on the Alternativ stage and one on the chill out stage.

Let’s meet to the alternativ stage for the opening of the festival with a special set prepared for this occasion from Uptempo to Techno via Ethnical sound rising to Progressiv Acidic
Trance, and maybe more who knows …
See you on the floor Taj ;-)

TERRA NINE

Terra Nine, aka Michael Westcot, is the creative force behind this unique act from New Zealand, combining live electric viola with lush organic synths and funky electronic beats to produce a distinctly organic and free form sound. His music features an aural palette ranging from psychedelic ambient to chilled out trance and breaks with uplifting emotional content that moves the heart as well as the feet.

Michael is hardly your typical digital artist - his music features a unique synergy of distinctly analog bowed and plucked organic strings - often mangled into mind bending psychedelic sounds and poured in real time over a bottom end of organic beats and fat basslines.

Terra Nine’s releases over the past decade have included three albums and a number of EPs, as well as tracks on myriad compilations, all featuring his unique mixture of live organic lushness.

Terra Nine’s music has also included remixes by and for numerous international artists - including dub maestro OTT, Astropilot, Suduaya, Kick Bong, Unknown Reality, Pete Ardron, Cloower Wooma, AKD and many more.

Over the past 10 years, Terra Nine has toured extensively, performing dynamic live shows at festival events worldwide. More recently, VJ Intelliki has joined Terra Nine, adding fantastic imagery to form the perfect synergistic visual accompaniment to the music.

Terra Nine’s latest EP, ‘Heart of the Matter’ (Iboga Records) - features 5 exceptional new tunes with psychedelic downtempo and dub / breaks flavours - providing a journey into new musical territory - glitchy, yet melodic.

Family of musicians , anglo :irish, living in vieure,
Ewan and tracey have been playing music for 30 years, touring , in India, Japan, Korea, China and Europe..Their first group together was called The Sons of The desert and played all the major festivals eg: Paleo, transmusicales, Interceltique de Lorient,inrocktibles..tamaris, and many more..
They married and had Ruby maebelle Shiels ,who now plays with them she has toured in corsica, and india and played festivals with her parents since she was 14 years old..Now at 18 she has a virtuosity in stringed insruments.ie Mandolins, Guitar, Banjo, Ukekele.
The shiels play a diverse set of songs ans instrumenals, from original composirions to cover versions and trad.

bio.fr:
Tilt débute le mix en 1993 et passe par plusieurs style tek et hardtek, joue avec des artistes de renommée internationale comme Garnier, Zinno, Carl Craig,Crystal Distortion...
En 2000, il découvre la psytrance, organise de nombreuses soirées et intègre en tant que dj le label français Avigmatic puis le label anglais Free Spirit records.
Après avoir joué dans divers pays d'Europe, au coté des plus grands (Infected Mushroom, Neelix, Astral Projection, Painkiller, Space Tribe...), il intègre la team Hadra sous ses deux projets Sangohan et Tilt.
Révélé par la qualité technique et l'histoire de ses mix, en moins de deux ans, Tilt joue sur de nombreuses scènes progressives avec des artistes comme Day Din, Egorythmia, Loud,Zyce...
On lui reconnaît alors un style dynamique et soutenu, teinté de psychédélisme, à la recherche d'une technique et d'une cohérence toujours plus soignées.
En 2013 TiLT sort sa première compilation, PROGRESSIVE EQUATION sur le label Hadra et devient rapidement dans le top 10 des meilleurs ventes sur Beatport et Psyshop,
PROGRESSIVE EQUATION II est sortie fin 2015 toujours sur le label Hadra Records et travaille actuellement sur une compilation qui sortira sur le label anglais Free Spirit Records.

bio.en: The "ToCaCumbia", a duo formed by Dj South American offer a structured performance on the reworking of musical tracks from the Latino/Cumbiero rhythm by proposing historical melodies of the classic Cumbia, accompanied by Percussion instruments and the beat of electronical music

bio.fr: Tripo (Co-Fondateur de PsykeDream) découvre le monde de la musique électronique en 2010 avec les free party,  puis il découvre le monde de la trance psychédélique sur une soirée organisé par les Kristal Sphère, avec Ianuaria et Ataro en tête d'affiche, qui deviendront ces djs phare de la scène Psytrance. C est en 2012 qu'il commence à monter des DjSets. Quelques temps après il commence a monter des Sets chill et ambiant avec des artistes comme Labs Cloud, Carbon Based Lifeforms, Aes Dana, Scann Tec, Lars LeonHard, Sigil, Terrapi, ToxyCue, Side Liner ... En septembre 2013 il décide de créer sa WebTv qui évoluera en Label Associatif et commence à sortir des compilations Chill avec des artistes nationaux et bientôt internationaux.

bio.en:
Tune Raider (Pamm Legg), is one of South Africa’s top female Psy-Trance DJ’s. She has been rocking the circuit for over 14 years and is still growing in popularity season after season.
Tune Raider has definitely earned her spot behind the decks, and has experience and years of working dance floors all around the world .
Nowadays Tune Raider boasts two very different style sets, a daytime full on psychedelic set and a night-time full psychedelic set, making her versatile and able to read a crowd and work the dance floor and making a good transition DJ between different LIVE acts.
Tune Raiders main calling card is not only her tight mixing and track selection, but it’s her magnetic stage presence and magical charisma that gets people dancing.

bio.fr:
DJ Turbo Boom-Boom, réchauffeur climatique de dancefloor et passionné de musiques tropicales, infatigable explorateur poli-rythmique, je pars régulièrement à la découverte de contrées musicales ensoleillées et folkloriques pour en ramener les meilleures pépites et proposer des sets pointus, éclectiques, festifs et chaleureux.

Recherchant les multiples hybridations possibles entre les musiques du mondes et les musiques actuelles, mes sets peuvent être tour à tour chill, down tempo, folkloriques, deep house, digital, disco, groovy et techno, mais un seul objectif : vous emmener en voyage, loin, ailleurs.

bio.en: Unknown Reality is another project of Ralph K. (Braincell, Rastaliens, Solar Spectrum). After producing Psytrance and Progressive for more than two decades, here he comes back to his roots as a guitar player, percussionist, computer musician and modular synthesist, who combines electronic elements with natural instruments and field recordings to create gently evolving soundscapes and rhythms.

Version Bizar experiences his vision of psychedelic music, both energetic and enchanting, his jazzy groove accompanies a digital atmosphere giving an original contrast.
Always looking for new texture come try the Bizar delirium !

bio.fr: Fasciné depuis toujours par l’électronique Via’on découvre les machines dans les années 90 et explore alors la synthèse sonore et les rythmes automatiques. Mélomane, curieux et imprégné des sons électroniques de tous horizons, il les manipule avec affection dans sa musique en parcourant les styles des plus rythmés aux plus calmes. Explorant les émotions, il tisse des mélodies aériennes sur des nappes éthérées. Il aime dépeindre des paysages colorés au fil d’un voyage onirique. Un album est actuellement en préparation.

Originaire de Grenoble, Robin (22) aka Xamek découvre la psytrance à l’âge de 15 ans. Nourri et influencé par des artistes tels que Jaia, Burn In Noise, Zen mechanics… il commence très tôt à produire ses tracks. L'association LGNE lui permet de jouer ses premières compositions. Aujourd'hui il soutient les associations LGNE, Wazacrew et Senoï project. Son live est un mélange de production moderne avec une touche de psytrance "old school" apporté grâce a des synthétiseurs analogiques.

bio.en:
One of the founding members of Hadra in 2001, Yann is since then volunteer and an activ member of the association.
His musical universe extends beyond psychedelic sounds and gives way for agitation.
He is inspired by colored full power ambiances, where the dancefloor provokes imagination and activates improvisation.

Always passionate about music, Gina had the chance to grow up in an manifold musical universe.
The abundance of the different styles and the possibilitys to combine them, pushed and motivated her to create mixes since 2011 in the style Psygressive.

"Music is the poetry of human expression in sound and time,
listen to the story and allow you on the dancefloor to release all your energy!"

Radioactive.Cake, Zeitgeist, Munstrous, Dark Passenger…that’s all Robert H. from Berlin Germany. Not only producer and performer for many years, he also established the music label Glitchy.Tonic.Records in 2009, which is now one of the leading forces in the subgenre "Psygressive Trance". Taking the first musical steps around the time of the millennium, his skills and technique and productions were constantly evolving and advancing over the years. In late 2008 he felt he finally reached the quality to go way more professional. He brought Radioactive.Cake and Zeitgeist to life, aiming for releases and gigs and of course for good feedback. Getting all three, he soon wanted another challenge or rather more ways of expressing his musical creativity and he started Munstrous and Dark Passenger. The total music range of all four projects put together goes from night time 'Psygressive' or 'Dark Progressive' to a bit more funky and jazzy and sometimes „swampy“ trance to some more techno stuff and downbeat. Today, Robert can look back to a long list of releases and has quite some experience performing his stuff live. He played his projects at Festivals like Freqs Of Nature, Boom Festival, Solaris Festival, Cosmo Festival, Transylvania Calling, Pandemonium Festival, SpaceCamp Psyfari Festival and others.
